page.title: 10BOXING - A POPULAR SPORT
page.content: Boxing is a very popular sport and takes a lot of training to be good. It has developed over the some odd years.In the early days they didn't use boxing gloves instead they used their fists.They also used something called a box.The box was used just incase they were hit below the waist .Now days boxing is a international sport.There are many weights here are some of them,feather weight, light weight,middle weight and heavy weight.In the 1960's and onwards there were lots of good fighters for instance Muhammad Ali,Joe Frazie r,Smokey Joe,Ken Norton, George Form an.Nowadays there are lots of Professional like Barry McGuigan, Hero Bomber Graham,Frank Bruno, Harry Cowap and lots more.
